title: I Knew You Were The One
itunes:title: I Knew You Were The One
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if love at first sight is a real thing, after a post about finding "the one", came to the surface, and according to our listeners it is possible! Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone who was fooled by "Fox News" Laura Ingraham and Raymond Arroyo's confused discussion on the Netflix show 'You'. Also, Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee" with one listener not sure what to do when dating someone with different politic beliefs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if love at first sight is a real thing, after a post about finding "the one", came to the surface, and according to our listeners it is possible! Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone who was fooled by "Fox News" Laura Ingraham and Raymond Arroyo's confused discussion on the Netflix show 'You'. Also, Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee" with one listener not sure what to do when dating someone with different politic beliefs.
